verses.roman:
āgamiṣyaty adīrgheṇa
kālena vrajam acyutaḥ
priyaṁ vidhāsyate pitror
bhagavān sātvatāṁ patiḥ

synonyms: āgamiṣyati—He will return; adīrgheṇa—not long; kālena—in time; vrajam—to Vraja; acyutaḥ—Kṛṣṇa, the infallible one; priyam—satisfaction; vidhāsyate—He will give; pitroḥ—to His parents; bhagavān—the Supreme Lord; sātvatām—of the devotees; patiḥ—master and protector.
translation: Infallible Kṛṣṇa, the Lord of the devotees, will soon return to Vraja to satisfy His parents.

purport.content: Here Uddhava begins to deliver Lord Kṛṣṇa's message.
